location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Sketch Map of Persia and Persian Gulf'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: printed in colour on paperDimensions: 360 x 440 mm

mods.abstract: Map showing Persia and the Persian Gulf. The map shows cities, main roads, and hydrology, and shows in red the boundaries of Consular districts in Persia. The map was produced by Simla Drawing Office in 1924 and produced by General staff, India.
